feed.title: Institute for Research and Innovation in Software for High Energy Physics
feed.subtitle: The Institute for Research and Innovation in Software for High Energy Physics (IRIS-HEP) has been established to meet the software and computing challenges of the planned upgrades to the Large Hadron Collider, the world's most powerful particle accelerator. IRIS-HEP pursues R&D for the software needed to acquire, manage, process and analyze the torrent of data that will be produced by the upgrade accelerator and its detectors as part of the search for discoveries beyond the Standard Model of Particle Physics.
